name: Bimbo Wizard
description:
This guy named Joseph got some magic gold bimbos from a magic yellow spider at the top of a tall building  and there was a magic vulture that didn't do anything, the spider just hangs in the sky kind of floating there. Anyway he got the magic gold bimbos so now he has turned himself into a green creature and is in the street eating women.
use the arrow keys to move the tip of your tongue and use it to catch women and feed them into your mouth. Do not get hit by a car while you have a woman on your tongue because it will be overburdened and destroyed.
